Title: TradeMe.Net Toolkit
Description:
This toolkit helps .Net developers write software that can access the TradeMe API.
The toolkit will work with .Net 3.5, .Net 4, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This toolkit helps .Net developers write software that can access the TradeMe API.
The toolkit will work with .Net 3.5, .Net 4, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7.

This SDK is written independently and is not associated with TradeMe

http://www.trademe.co.nz has recently released their much anticipated API. This can be accessed via http://developer.trademe.co.nz. This toolkit has been written to access these API's from C# in an easy manor.

The initial focus will be on Windows Phone 7. Once this is working, I will then move onto Silverlight and the .Net framework.

This SDK is written independently and is not associated with TradeMe.
